text: Klavdia Papadopoulou (born 18 August 2002), known as Klavdia, is a Greek singer. She represented Greece at the Eurovision Song Contest 2025 with the song "Asteromata", where she finished in 6th place with 231 points. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== Title Details Asteromata * Release date: 19 May 2025 * Label: Arcade Music, Panik Records * Formats: Digital download, streaming ===Extended plays=== Title Details Klavdia * Released: 16 February 2024 * Label: Arcade Music, Panik Records * Formats: Digital download, streaming ===Singles=== ====As lead artist==== Title Year Peak chart positions Certifications Album GRE Local Peak chart positions for singles in Greece: * "Haramata": * "Nyxta mou megali": * "Asteromata": LTU SWE Heat. SWI UK Down.
